origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BankingAPI.get_monetary_policy', 'description': 'This function provides the latest monetary policy statement based on the country and policy type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the monetary policy is required.'}, {'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of monetary policy statement, e.g., latest, historical.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policyStatement', 'description': 'The latest monetary policy statement.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BankingAPI.get_monetary_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'UK', 'policyType'是'latest'.
